```
In `@scripts/sync-mcp-tokens.js` around lines 39 - 41, The "fill" branch currently
overwrites all leaf values with process.env[key] regardless of sensitivity;
update the action === "fill" logic in scripts/sync-mcp-tokens.js to only use
process.env[key] when the key is in SENSITIVE_KEYS (e.g., check
SENSITIVE_KEYS.includes(key)), otherwise keep the original value (assign value
to newObj[key]). Ensure you reference the variables action, key, value, newObj
and the SENSITIVE_KEYS constant when applying this conditional.
```
